mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, t1.uri, t1.options, t1.type, t1.description, t1.create_time as createTime, t1.create_user_id as createUserId, t1.modify_time as modifyTime, t1.modify_user_id as modifyUserId, t2.username as createUserName, t3.username as modifyUserName from t_scd_scheduler_config t1 left join t_scd_user t2 on t1.create_user_id = t2.id left join t_scd_user t3 on t1.modify_user_id = t3.id where t1.id = #{id}
select count(1) from t_scd_scheduler_config where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_scd_scheduler_config(name, uri, options, type, description, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id) values(#{name}, #{uri}, #{options}, #{type}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyUserId})
mapper.update: update t_scd_scheduler_config set name = #{name}, uri = #{uri}, options = #{options}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} where id = #{id}
